cleaned_text: [ Uncover your Compassionate Healer ](https://epitomeofspirituality.wordpress.com/2013/08/20/uncover-your-compassionate-healer/) While modern science defines health in relation to the body, alternative therapies see health as the natural outcome of a harmonious correlation between body, mind, spirt and its connection with the supreme
